parameters.name: LinkedVar
parameters.description: Array of VARIANT_BOOL values indicating if a document is linked or not

title: IModelDocExtension.GetAttachments
description: Gets the attachments for this document.

parameters.name: LinkedVar
parameters.description: Array of VARIANT_BOOL values indicating if a document is linked or not

returns: Array of strings of the names of the attachments for this document
remarks:
This method is supported by SOLIDWORKS 2005 and later.
There is a one-to-one correspondence between the output arrays.
